Talking About Love And Life, Alia Bhatt Confirms That She Has Found The 'One'
This year has been really lucky for a lot of people as cupid stuck for many of them. From Priyanka-Nick to Ranbir-Alia, these couples have love stories that are more beautiful than fairy tales.
If we talk about Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt, this couple started off as friends to co-stars, before taking a leap ahead and getting into a relationship. Alia-Ranbir has been together for over a year now and they have given us enough hints on their relationship.
In a recent interview with Vogue India magazine, Alia was asked about her dialogue in her film, Dear Zindagi, “Is there someone like the one? What is this perfect one exactly? Mere liye toh koi perfect hona chahiye na.,” to which, Alia said,
“Yeah, I think I have”. She further added that in love she is an ‘affectionate, beautiful person’. “I have stars and a halo on my head, and I’m walking around with rainbows. I like to keep it simple and sweet."
She added that even though she doesn't like to talk about her personal life but she also doesn't like to conceal her feelings. She added,
